title: paramakrpa saagari
sahitya:
paramakrupA sAgarI pAhi paramEshwari



anupallavi



padmanAbha sOdari bhakthi priya vashankari

sarasIjabhava hariharanuthEndu shEkhari 

(ciTTa swaram)



ciTTa swaram





S,RM ,MGM P,DP || MPDS DPMD PPMG ||

      ...  ...    .                

SRMP DSRM ,GSR || S,P, PDSP ,MDP ||

MG (parama)





caraNam



sakala vEdAgama sArE sAdhuhrudaya vihArE

nikhila bhuvanAdhArE nityAnandakarE

nirupamakAntha sharIrE nIlakanta manOharE

srImahAtripura sundari sri ganesha skanda janani

smaradahana shiva vAma taruni chinthAmani manOnmani

(parama)
